Uses of Interface
com.noctarius.borabora.Output

  • Packages that use Output 
    Package Description
    com.noctarius.borabora
    borabora is a CBOR, the Concise Binary Object Representation, skip-scan processor which consists of a generator as well as a parser.
    com.noctarius.borabora.spi.builder
    This package contains the semantic tag builder SPI, which can be used to provide support for additional, not builtin, semantic tag data item types.
    com.noctarius.borabora.spi.io  

    • Uses of Output in com.noctarius.borabora

      Methods in com.noctarius.borabora that return Output 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Output Output.toByteArray(byte[] bytes)
      Returns an Output instance backed by the provided bytes byte-array.
      static Output Output.toCompositeBuffer(CompositeBuffer compositeBuffer)
      Returns an Output instance backed by the provided compositeBuffer.
      static Output Output.toNative(long address, long size)
      Returns an Output instance backed by the provided address which represents a native memory address and the given size for the number of available bytes.
      static Output Output.toOutputStream(OutputStream out)
      Returns an Output instance backed by the provided out OutputStream instance.
      Methods in com.noctarius.borabora with parameters of type Output 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GraphBuilder Writer.newGraphBuilder(Output output)
      Returns a new GraphBuilder instance bound to the given output.
